import axios from "axios"; import React from "react"; import { Link, useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; const CardFavorites = ({ movieID }) => { const [movie, setMovie] = React.useState([]); const history = useHistory(); React.useEffect(() => { axios .get(`/api/movies/${movieID}`) .then((re) => re.data) .then((data) => { setMovie(data); }); }, []); const handleClick = () => { axios .delete(`/api/favorites/${movie.id}`) .then(() => alert(`Se elimino la pelicula`)) /* .then(() => history.push("/home")) */ }; return (

{/* */}

{movie.title}

{movie.overview}

Fecha de lanzamiento:

{movie.release_date}

); }; export default CardFavorites;
